info.name: Mahraba Sheikh
info.description:
Collection of APIs for a Meal service.

Make sure to check the `Examples` Section under each request to see more options about the parameters and the available filtering.

request.description:
Returns a paginated response of all the available ingredients along with the supplier of that ingredient.

Can user the following filters:

`supplier.name[like]` and `supplier.id[eq]`

response.name: List Available Ingredients
List Ingredients with Supplier ID filter
List Ingredients with Supplier Name Filter

request.description:
Creates a new ingredient

`name`: is the name of the ingredient

`measure`: is either `kg` , `g`, or `pieces`

`supplier` is the supplier ID
Returns a paginated list of all the recipes along with their ingredients

response.name: List Recipes with Ingredients

request.description:
Creates a new Recipe

`name`: is the name of the recipe

`description`: a short description of the recipe and what to expect

`ingredients` : is an array of the ingredients required for this recipe, the object in the ingredient has two fields:

1. `id`: which is the ID of the ingredient
2. `amount`: is the amount required of this ingredient for this specific recipe. Note that only `kg` and `g` measure types on the ingredient can have fractions, `pieces` will need a whole number.

Create a new Box (order) with the preferred recipes.

`delivery_date`: is the date for the box to be delivered. This should not be within 48 hours of the order.

`recipe_ids`: is an array that contains the IDs of the recipes to be included in the order.

response.name: Fails if the delivery date is less than 48 hours
Fails if the recipe id is not available
Creates a new box and returns the delivery date along with the box components

request.description:
Lists all the available Boxes (orders)

can be filtered by `delivery_date`

the following operators can be used: `gt, lt, gte, lte, eq`

response.name: List Boxes along with their Recipes
Filter boxes by delivery date "greater than"
Filter boxes by delivery date "less than"
Without order date (gets upto 7 days from today)
With order dates gets up to 7 days from the order date
